General.Name: KHD Humboldt Wedag Vermögensverwaltungs-AG
General.Description: KHD Humboldt Wedag Vermögensverwaltungs-AG provides industrial plant equipment and services for the cement and mining industries in Germany. The company was formerly known as KHD Humboldt Wedag Industrial Services AG and changed its name to KHD Humboldt Wedag Vermögensverwaltungs-AG in July 2017. The company is based in Cologne, Germany.
